For Jaylen Brown and Kyrie Irving, time heals all wounds.
It's no secret Irving didn't blend well with the Celtics' young players during his tenure in Boston. The C's needed a veteran leader alongsi… [+1854 chars]

articles.author: Mark Schlabach
articles.title: Bryson DeChambeau has wrist surgery, status for PGA Championship in doubt - ESPN
articles.description: After Thursday's wrist surgery, Bryson DeChambeau said he looks "forward to competing at the highest level within the next two months."
articles.content:
Bryson DeChambeau had surgery on his left wrist Thursday, writing on Instagram that he hopes to return to the PGA Tour within the next two months.
DeChambeau said Dr. Thomas Graham, an orthopedic su… [+1549 chars]

articles.author: Jeff Borzello
articles.title: Penn State men's basketball adding transfers Camren Wynter, Andrew Funk - ESPN
articles.description: Camren Wynter, a first-team All-CAA selection who averaged 15.8 points at Drexel, and Andrew Funk, who averaged a career-best 17.6 points at Bucknell, are both transferring to Penn State.
articles.content:
Penn State added two all-conference transfers on Thursday, with former Drexel guard Camren Wynter and former Bucknell guard Andrew Funk committing to the Nittany Lions.
Wynter (No. 69) and Funk (No.… [+2827 chars]

articles.content:
